member.name: M:ArrayExercises.Program.Min(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Returns the minimum element from an array, or int.MinValue if minimum cannot be calculated.
member.returns: The minimum element from an array, or int.MinValue if minimum cannot be calculated.

member.name: M:ArrayExercises.Program.Max(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Returns the maximum element from an array, or int.MaxValue if maximum cannot be calculated.
member.returns: The maximum element from an array, or int.MaxValue if maximum cannot be calculated.

member.name: M:ArrayExercises.Program.IndexOf(System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the index of the specified element.
member.returns: The zero based index of the specified element if found, -1 otherwise.
